businessProfile.name: Martino's Italian Kitchen
businessProfile.address: 8241 S Fort Apache Rd #101, Las Vegas, NV 89178, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 8241 S Fort Apache Rd #101, Las Vegas, NV 89178, USA

reviews.text: I don't know what happened to Martino's but this is definitely unacceptable. I remember get the combo 2 slices with soda. Slices were big before that I would actually have like 4 slices. And not burnt pizza. I came home thinking I'm gonna take bite out of a good pizza. But unfortunately it isn't that same.

The food was delicious and at a great price, the workers were all very friendly and made it feel like home. They had wonderful and authentic tasting Italian food and beer, with very cool decor. For your birthday they give you an awesome promo for the month, not sure if it‚Äôs always the same but my girlfriend got $15 of free credit to use and it was valid from the beginning of the month and until 3 days after your actual birthday. For delicious pizza or other Italian food and kind caring and timely service I‚Äôd recommend it.

5-Star well deserved. I came here tonight for their 2 slice pizza and soda special. I sat down in the dining area and watched some of the ball game. My pizza was hot and super tasty. I think it was perfect actually. Just the right amount of sauce/cheese, the dough was ideal size and especially the crust, which was cooked just right with small burnt ends.. yummy. The price was so reasonable. I liked the staff a lot. Most importantly, the guy who made my pizza is amazing. I‚Äôm coming back because of him. He rocks that oven and makes the pizza fresh right there. The place was spotless. On a side note, there was a confusion on an order with another guest regarding her vegan meal. I would like to give compliments to the manager who was sincere with her situation and remedied it fairly and quickly. She was happy when she left. Great Italian pizza joint on the Southwest side of town that I highly recommend‚Ä¶.

I randomly stopped in a few months ago because the awesome sign spinner at the time made my day. They have a 2 slice and a can of soda deal that I tried and now I'm hooked. 2 slices are basically half a pizza! They are so generous with their delicious garlic parmigiano fries. Everything is hot and freshly made. It's a nice, quiet and laid back place. The staff has always been calm and attentive. I think the manager served me once and you could tell he really cares about his business.

Now that's a slice of pizza üçï  ! We drove all the way from green valley to try this amazing restaurant and you know the pie is gonna be good when you have to hold the slice with 2 hands I kid you not it was the biggest slice I've ever got in my life the undercarriage was crispy and the crust was delicious like a crunchy soft cracker and that cheese üßÄ  omg super thick and chewy it's definitely a 10 out of 10 slice our server Fiona was so nice and pleasant to my wife we really appreciate it it came out to 8.66 for 2 slices and a soda trust me you can't beat that anywhere on fort apache I promise you will leave happy and full and it won't break the bank so if you're in the area come say hi the pizza here is amazing.

recentReviews.text: Great pizza that has so much flavor.   Service is always top notch and efficiently is off the chart.  Thanks for bring my go to Pizza ‚Äúparlor‚Äù as we say in Brooklyn!!!

Very friendly and helpful
And amazing delicious pizza everytime üòã

Martino‚Äôs serves fresh Italian food with a good selection of deli options. Very helpful kitchen to address dietary concerns. Our family loves the eggplant parmesan and chicken alfredo, always served with plenty of pasta. The fresh bread - on subs or as garlic bread - is so tasty!

Ordered pizza asked if order was understood, Yes. At the at the store noticed it eas e wrong, instead of making a new pizza they just added ingredients and reheated pizza.sevond time this has happened.
Staff was very friendly and food was delicious. Definitely would return if I was local to this place.

detailedReviews.author: Patricia J
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza that has so much flavor.   Service is always top notch and efficiently is off the chart.  Thanks for bring my go to Pizza ‚Äúparlor‚Äù as we say in Brooklyn!!!

detailedReviews.author: Luanne Keohokapu
detailedReviews.text:
Very friendly and helpful
And amazing delicious pizza everytime üòã

detailedReviews.author: Brian Each
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Cynthia Grinzivich
detailedReviews.text: Martino‚Äôs serves fresh Italian food with a good selection of deli options. Very helpful kitchen to address dietary concerns. Our family loves the eggplant parmesan and chicken alfredo, always served with plenty of pasta. The fresh bread - on subs or as garlic bread - is so tasty!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Kassel
detailedReviews.text: The driver was great!!

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Gutierrez
detailedReviews.text: Ordered pizza asked if order was understood, Yes. At the at the store noticed it eas e wrong, instead of making a new pizza they just added ingredients and reheated pizza.sevond time this has happened.

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Trujillo
detailedReviews.text: Staff was very friendly and food was delicious. Definitely would return if I was local to this place.

detailedReviews.author: David Skipworth
detailedReviews.text: This is my favorite pizza in las vegas. It competes with any pizza I have had in chicago.

detailedReviews.author: Alicia B
detailedReviews.text:
Finally, pizza that didn‚Äôt make me hate myself.

I was craving something that wasn‚Äôt a greasy cardboard circle from Domino‚Äôs or Pizza Hut, so I asked ChatGPT and it said, ‚ÄúGo to Martinos.‚Äù I trusted the bot and my taste buds are still thanking me.

We got the Gyro Trip and a cheese pizza. Both were amazing. Not heavy, not greasy, just crispy, cheesy goodness. I ate two slices (okay fine, they were huge‚Äîprobably four slices in disguise) and didn‚Äôt spiral into shame afterward.

The crust? Perfection. The kind that makes you want to eat the pizza backwards just to enjoy it more. The gyro toppings were fresh and delicious‚Ä¶could‚Äôve used a bit more meat, but honestly, still delicious.

Two 16‚Äù pizzas fed our family of four and only three slices survived. RIP. We also grabbed cannolis because we‚Äôre not quitters. They were chef‚Äôs kiss.

Moral of the story: Trust the crust. Go to Martinos.

detailedReviews.author: Flamingo Nest
detailedReviews.text: Martinos has become one of  our favorite places in Las Vegas. Easy to order online, easy to pickup, easy to communicate.

detailedReviews.author: Arthur Wu
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered a pizza, caesar salad, tenders and fries, and wings. Unfortunately, a small side salad was put into the bag instead of the large salad that we ordered. I didn't notice this until I got home and when I called, they said they can't give a refund or do much about it until the manager comes in the next day. I didn't know if I would get my refund and I didn't want to risk it so I spend 40 minutes going back and getting the right salad. This means that I come home to cold food, which isn't great tasting. Will update if my experience is better next time.

Update: After going another few times, I realized that I enjoy coming here but my best experiences are during the day. Super friendly staff, great food that's consistent, excellent experience overall. My complaints come later at night where the owners or manager isn't there. But overall, I'm enjoying going here and will continue to update my review.

Update 2: Been another few times. Dropping stars back down. I went and decided to get their four slices and a drink combo for $7.99 as shown on their TV menu, but they rang me up at $9.99 plus service charge and tax. I inquired as to why it was wrong and they just said their menu was wrong and that it was $9.99. A couple of weeks later their menu is still incorrect. Today, I picked up two large cheese pizzas to bring home. Came home and found out neither of them were sliced at all so I decided to downgrade my review back to where it was.

detailedReviews.author: Lori Wentworth
detailedReviews.text: Ordered take out dinners and they were delicious! Ordering is easy and pick up wast fast.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Desando
detailedReviews.text: Great spot to grab a pizza from. Just moved to Vegas from Toronto not long ago and have ordered countless times already lol. The wings are good too! Really enjoy it.

detailedReviews.author: Mel Stephenson
detailedReviews.text: We ordered food on Friday and all of us have had stomach issues, gas and the runs all weekend. The food was cold, and bland. We ordered garlic knots the marinara was cold, meatball sub-cold, bun not toasted, cheese pizza and pepperoni pizza. The food was not held under a heat lamp upon arrival was just sitting on the counter. It was not busy. Unfortunately will not be returning to this place.

detailedReviews.author: BIG DAWG EL JEFE
detailedReviews.text: I don't know what happened to Martino's but this is definitely unacceptable. I remember get the combo 2 slices with soda. Slices were big before that I would actually have like 4 slices. And not burnt pizza. I came home thinking I'm gonna take bite out of a good pizza. But unfortunately it isn't that same.

detailedReviews.author: Vincent Sims
detailedReviews.text: Awesome food and service. Martino's is FIVE STARS all the way.

detailedReviews.author: User
detailedReviews.text: Recently ordered something to go from here and very disappointed.  The pizza did not look like what was advertised at all.  No effort went into it maybe due to the fact they were closing soon.  Even looked like a piece of the pizza was missing.

detailedReviews.author: Melani Stone
detailedReviews.text: Always have a great dinner when I order dinner from Martino‚Äôs . The lasagna is AMAZING!!!

detailedReviews.author: Tricia V
detailedReviews.text:
Love your pizza!
Fast delivery!

detailedReviews.author: Allison Cira
detailedReviews.text: 10/10!!! My favorite Italian spot in Vegas! The owner is beyond kind and the food is amazing and great proportion sizes!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Falco
detailedReviews.text: My wife and I have been to Martino‚Äôs a handful of times. Great food and excellent service! The prices are extremely reasonable- Great value and experience!

detailedReviews.author: Courtney Banks
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is outstanding! The flavor is unmatched and all the ingredients are fresh. The cooks are really cool and inviting and the place is always super clean and the aromas are so yummy.

detailedReviews.author: Sinead Magee
detailedReviews.text: The food is EXCELLENT!!! Everything! The pizza, salads, subs & the cheesecake is heavenly!! Staff are fantastic! We love Martinos!!

detailedReviews.author: William Lopez
detailedReviews.text: Small place, big portions.  Pretty good so far, need to try more things.

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Jones
detailedReviews.text: Pretty underwhelming pizzas. Very scarce toppings. Garlic bread was delicious though. I won‚Äôt be ordering again from here though. I tried it twice and each time the pizzas had very little toppings.

detailedReviews.author: cody hollis
detailedReviews.text: SANDWICH WAS SO SOGGY AND DRENCHED COULDNT EAT IT ???????????

detailedReviews.author: Richard
detailedReviews.text: I was on the fence of where to order pizza from today for the USA hockey game. I was debating to drive across town to check out a place that I saw online, but then I remembered about Martinos behind Rhodes Ranch. I looked on yelp and saw that I left a review there 3 years ago stating that the pizza was really good. I told myself that I‚Äôm going to eat there again today, and see if it‚Äôs still as good as a review that I left before. The pizza was absolutely phenomenal, and I couldn‚Äôt have been happier with my choice. The toppings don‚Äôt fall off the pizza when you bite it. I got the gluten-free option and that was really really good. Overall, I was completely happy, and this is definitely my new pizza place from now on.

detailedReviews.author: jenny bahler
detailedReviews.text: They have really good food!

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Rupp
detailedReviews.text: We always have a wonderful meal and experience.  Highly recommended!

detailedReviews.author: E. E. Esseck
detailedReviews.text: Great portion of chicken parm dinner prepared quickly, & DELICIOUS!

detailedReviews.author: MD Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: We get this pizza at least once every month. It‚Äôs a nice little spot, a real gem in the SW.

detailedReviews.author: Daysi Ramirez
detailedReviews.text: The food is always fresh and delicious. The atmosphere is clean and comfortable. The staff is extremely polite.

detailedReviews.author: bereniz castaneda
detailedReviews.text: I love their pizzas, their weekly specials, and the cannolis are sooo good too!! My family and I love coming here and they are all so friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Curran
detailedReviews.text: One of our go-to places to order.  Food is great and they have amazing deals.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Birk
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic pizza, awesome specialty pizza combinations that are out of this world and the best lunch specials!

detailedReviews.author: Chan Dame
detailedReviews.text: Chill, consistently good, fairly priced pizza place with friendly faces. What's not to like? 11/10

detailedReviews.author: Hazeypooh
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Tim Jackson
detailedReviews.text: This place used to be legit, not anymore though, low quality ingredients you can tell immediately when you open the box it‚Äôs a different product

detailedReviews.author: Mercy Coleman
detailedReviews.text: My family and I have been going here for quite some time now and never had any issues. Tonight was the last order I will be placing with them. I agree with the other reviews that the quality has gone downhill. The wings were burnt and super salty. The garlic knots were not cooked properly. They looked like they were just thrown on the griddle and flipped a couple of times. They were doughy; they were not soft and fluffy like they usually are. Both pizzas I ordered didn't taste right; I couldn't put my finger on it. Perhaps the ingredients weren't fresh. And I don't recall them using fried chicken on their BBQ pizza (could be just me as I haven't ordered a BBQ pizza in a while). It sucks because they are so close to my house and have always been our go-to for pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jim Walker
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is good, but the store bought ranch has got to go

detailedReviews.author: Ron Rickwald
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, especially while watching a Golden Knights game.

detailedReviews.author: Sophie H
detailedReviews.text: Heerlijk broodje aubergine met parmezaan! Aanrader!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Dake
detailedReviews.text:
Updated Review:

The quality seems to have really fallen off. Though we‚Äôve had issues now and then(the first pizza we ordered wasn‚Äôt sliced), we‚Äôve kept going back because the quality of food was great.

However, the last 4 or 5 times we‚Äôve picked up orders, ingredients have been missing from the pizzas, freshness seems to have gone downhill and overall food quality has dropped.

This was by far our favorite pizza place in town for a while, now we‚Äôll probably only go back if we really don‚Äôt feel like driving somewhere more consistent with quality.

Original Review:

We have tried a lot of pizza places all over Vegas, and Martino's is by far our favorite. Living with a New Yorker, she's got a high standard for pizza and we kissed a lot of toads, pizza wise, before we found her Prince in Martino's.

The Bee Sting is by far our favorite pizza. The crust is perfect, sauce is delicious and everything is fresh. They do amazing salads and cannolis too.

Martino's is the only place we order Pizza from anymore.

detailedReviews.author: Yessi Jorda
detailedReviews.text: Fast Authentic Italian food

detailedReviews.author: Law Cook
detailedReviews.text:
This place is awesome. The best pizza in Las Vegas and I have been here since the late 80's. Courtney and the rest of the staff make you feel like family. They are so accomondating.

Also any food you try is going to be very delicious and tasty! You will not be disappointed coming here!

I will drive 50 miles out of my way to come here.

detailedReviews.author: C.E. Robinson
detailedReviews.text:
Just like Mamma‚Äôs home cooking!   The pizzas are the best in town and if you slap yo mamma after eating the lasagna, I promise she wont get upset!

She‚Äôll just slap you back with That pizza üçï baby!!!

detailedReviews.author: Austin Signoretti
detailedReviews.text: The food was delicious and at a great price, the workers were all very friendly and made it feel like home. They had wonderful and authentic tasting Italian food and beer, with very cool decor. For your birthday they give you an awesome promo for the month, not sure if it‚Äôs always the same but my girlfriend got $15 of free credit to use and it was valid from the beginning of the month and until 3 days after your actual birthday. For delicious pizza or other Italian food and kind caring and timely service I‚Äôd recommend it.

detailedReviews.author: Just Alex
detailedReviews.text:
Got a cold sub combo and spaghetti with meatballs. Both were good and fresh. Will try their pizza another time.
Edit: Got the Italian job 10' pizza. Delicious. They have gelato in the small freezer too. Was skeptical but it is actually gelato. Not a lot of flavors and it's in a cup but better than nothing since the gelato place I always go to closed down during covid.

detailedReviews.author: Zolt√°n F≈±zy
detailedReviews.text: No good food what you want you need a order give it other. Wait a lot time because inside full time talking. Come other costumer fater after you. And to expensive. NO MORE

detailedReviews.author: Brent James
detailedReviews.text:
Best Pizza and Italian Food around. Friendly staff!
Awesome Deals!

detailedReviews.author: A.J. Walsh
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was very good!

detailedReviews.author: Kristin S
detailedReviews.text: I just want to let you all know, this place goes through staff at a very rapid rate for a restaurant in Las Vegas. Probably because their manager Frank Storione is condescending and rude to people. Eat somewhere that treats their staff well!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff House
detailedReviews.text: The pizza isn't terrible, but it's not great either. My teenager said it was "mid", I kinda think I know what that means and I agree.

detailedReviews.author: Abigail Taitano
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza, pasta and garlic bread! I highly recommend the garlic bread and marinara pasta over the fettuccine. Overall, great customer service and food!

detailedReviews.author: –ü–µ—Ç—Ä –í–∞—Å–∏–ª—å–µ–≤
detailedReviews.text: bad attitude towards the client, they take orders and then cancel them on their terms

detailedReviews.author: Vegas Local
detailedReviews.text: We order from here all the time it‚Äôs around the corner from us. They won‚Äôt answer the phone at 7:30 pm on a Monday‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: Jonathan Edward
detailedReviews.text: I ordered Martinos pizza during my lunch hour here at work. My food delivery arrived in a timely manner and the food was amazing. They even t hooked me up with some cannolis and garlic knots which I was not expecting. I want to say thank you it was highly appreciated

detailedReviews.author: Kali Jayd
detailedReviews.text: Such a cute great place to get some lunch or dinner.. fresh ingredients and fabulous atmosphere.. the staff is so friendly.. just a great place to hang out.. highly recommend! üëçüëç

detailedReviews.author: Henry Cuello
detailedReviews.text: La mejor comida y servicio, la mejor pizzer√≠a <3

detailedReviews.author: Amar Raavi
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza place in Southwest part of the valley. Excellent food and service.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Fuller
detailedReviews.text: This is one of my neighborhood go to spots for pizza. I think its the godfather that is fantastic. I like the scooters on the walls and food quality. I strongly recommend. Support small local businesses.

detailedReviews.author: W W
detailedReviews.text: I have ordered from Martino‚Äôs 4 or 5 times and they have consistently been delicious and super generous with their portions. Prices are reasonable. The chicken parm is my favorite, definitely splittable. Super delicious. Their slice of cheese pizza is a quarter of a whole pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jess SH
detailedReviews.text: You won‚Äôt feel sluggish after eating their pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Mitchell Cuff
detailedReviews.text: Who sends burnt food to people? Does nobody check what they send out?

detailedReviews.author: Wilford Grimley
detailedReviews.text:
I don't leave reviews but this one has to be done. Ive been spending money at Martino's for at least a year and a half or so now on a fairly regular basis. That consistency was brought on by the service and the food being absolutely amazing. They're seemingly on a decline. Of the past few orders, when I ask for my chicken extra crispy, it's hit or miss if they make it the way I asked versus it being perfect each time before. That's not the main issue. The issue is my most recent visit. Got the notification pulling up that my order was ready but got made to wait when I walked in, even after being made to wait my bread is cold and the chicken is barely cooked through. The most egregious part of this experience to me is the guy at the front. I've complained about his trash attitude, and was told that I wasn't the first to complain about him. Not only does he still work there but he's at the front when I walk in and gives me more attitude about the amount of ketchup packets I asked for. "Do you really need that much?" No but that's what I asked for so you need to learn to act right.  I don't know if they changed owners or what, but the consistency of integrity went out the window. Better off going to Dominos at this point. You all know EXACTLY who I am and how to reach me, but I won't hold my breath.

I'd also like to point out, it was EXTREMELY bad form to just stop taking phone calls all together.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Flood
detailedReviews.text: Wasn't crazy about the pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Monserrat Jimenez
detailedReviews.text: Martino‚Äôs not only has great pizza and other appetizers, but some of the friendliest and most helpful staff out there! It‚Äôs definitely a must try when in town and I‚Äôm very lucky that it‚Äôs close to home!

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Nerey
detailedReviews.text: What a pleasant surprise this hidden gem was to find! The pizza is hot fresh and crisp! The sauce is a mix of sweet and savory that is a perfect compliment to the perfectly baked crust. The cheese and toppings are generous and the price is right! I‚Äôve had more expensive pizzas that didn‚Äôt deliver and wouldn‚Äôt hold a candle to the perfect cook and taste of pizza from Martinos!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Bishop
detailedReviews.text: I came to this establishment at 8:40 and the guy inside said they were closed. 2 more ppl  came to the door after me. They lost 3 different customer due to the guy inside being a lazy bum

detailedReviews.author: Rae Knight
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was soooooo good. Staff was super nice. The hit wings and salad and bread sticks were delicious.  Definitely going back!!

detailedReviews.author: Brian Tanouye
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza and subs in town.

detailedReviews.author: Judy Allen
detailedReviews.text:
It's a great locals place and the food is good.
The people working there recognize you when you walk in the door and that is always a big plus.

detailedReviews.author: Pat hame
detailedReviews.text: Customer service is always great here. But lately, the last three times I ate here. The pizza has been a bit burnt specifically, the bottom crust.  Not sure if they change cooks. I‚Äôve been to this location a number of time's (about 20 times) and this never happened before. Till recently. Not sure what changed‚Ä¶..

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.2/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the delicious and flavorful pizza, highlighting its non-greasy, crispy, and cheesy goodness. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The service at Martino's is described as top-notch, friendly, and efficient, making it a favorite spot for both locals and newcomers. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Martino's offers easy online ordering and quick pickup, making it convenient for customers to enjoy their meals without hassle. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent food quality and incorrect orders - review management can address this concern
Negative customer service experiences, particularly with staff attitude - social media marketing can improve this area
Incorrect pricing and outdated menu information - Boostly marketing services can improve this

Very friendly and helpful
And amazing delicious pizza everytime üòã

neutral.text: My family and I have been going here for quite some time now and never had any issues. Tonight was the last order I will be placing with them. I agree with the other reviews that the quality has gone downhill. The wings were burnt and super salty. The garlic knots were not cooked properly. They looked like they were just thrown on the griddle and flipped a couple of times. They were doughy; they were not soft and fluffy like they usually are. Both pizzas I ordered didn't taste right; I couldn't put my finger on it. Perhaps the ingredients weren't fresh. And I don't recall them using fried chicken on their BBQ pizza (could be just me as I haven't ordered a BBQ pizza in a while). It sucks because they are so close to my house and have always been our go-to for pizza.

Update: After going another few times, I realized that I enjoy coming here but my best experiences are during the day. Update 2: Been another few times. Dropping stars back down. I went and decided to get their four slices and a drink combo for $7.99 as shown on their TV menu, but they rang me up at $9.99 plus service charge and tax. I inquired as to why it was wrong and they just said their menu was wrong and that it was $9.99. A couple of weeks later their menu is still incorrect. Today, I picked up two large cheese pizzas to bring home. Came home and found out neither of them were sliced at all so I decided to downgrade my review back to where it was.

We ordered garlic knots the marinara was cold, meatball sub-cold, bun not toasted, cheese pizza and pepperoni pizza. The food was not held under a heat lamp upon arrival was just sitting on the counter. It was not busy. Unfortunately will not be returning to this place.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
